name: reportgenerator
description: RKTracerCodeCoverageReport for RKTracer code coverage reports.
author: RKValidate, Palmmedia

inputs.name: reports
inputs.label: Reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: The coverage reports that should be parsed (separated by semicolon). Globbing is supported.

inputs.name: targetdir
inputs.label: Target directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where the generated report should be saved.

inputs.name: sourcedirs
inputs.label: Source directories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional directories which contain the corresponding source code (separated by semicolon). The source directories are used if coverage report contains classes without path information.

inputs.name: historydir
inputs.label: History directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional directory for storing persistent coverage information. Can be used in future reports to show coverage evolution.

inputs.name: plugins
inputs.label: Plugins
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional plugin files for custom reports or custom history storage (separated by semicolon).

inputs.name: assemblyfilters
inputs.label: Assembly filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of assemblies that should be included or excluded in the report. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: classfilters
inputs.label: Class filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of classes that should be included or excluded in the report. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: filefilters
inputs.label: File filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional list of files that should be included or excluded in the report. Exclusion filters take precedence over inclusion filters. Wildcards are allowed.

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: The verbosity level of the log messages. Values: Verbose, Info, Warning, Error, Off
